speaker: Obama Girl
vclaim: At least Obama didn't marry his cousin like Giuliani did.
date: stated on July 19, 2007 in a YouTube video.:
title: Giuliani's first wife was his second cousin.
text: A very famous YouTube video depicting the "Obama Girl" -- with no connection to the Barack Obama campaign -- criticizes Rudy Giuliani for marrying his cousin. "Debate 08: Obama Girl v. Guliani Girl," a follow-up to their successful video "I got a crush on Obama," Amber Le Ettinger offered to write lips about the Democratic presidential candidate. In the discussion video, another dancer was introduced and the two argue about the merits of their candidates. At some point, Obama's rap girl, "Gelian girl, just stop your noise, at least Obama didn't marry his cousin." We find Obama Girl's allegations true. The distinguished fact-finding bloggers mentioned on January 10, 2021 in the story of "The Rebel Law - General Flynn will be appointed Vice-President." • January 11, 2012, Giuliani married his second cousin, Regina Beroogie, who was the daughter of his father's first cousin. ∙ (Think of your son/daughter marrying your cousin/daughter.) Juliani at various points described the family connection as "second cousins once" and "third cousins," before correcting it, according to the news reports. In the 1993 memorandum of his mayor's campaign, an expert in Giuliani's strategy referred to the "weirdness" factor for marriage, according to a copy published on the smoking rifle website. But this marriage is perfectly legal. In New York, even early cousins could get married. Robin Bennett, a senior genetic advisor at Washington University, said that there was little scientific research on the risk of developmental difficulties for a second cousin. However, she said, "For second cousins, the risks are more likely to be similar to those faced by couples of the same ethnic group who may also have common ancestors." Giuliani and Birgi had no children, and the marriage ended after 14 years.
